oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Hooks, Wife Accept Award, Praise"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Baker, Howard H., Jr.; Hooks, Benjamin L.; Hooks, Frances; National Conference of Christians and Jews; 1970s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Ben and Frances Hooks were presented the 1977 National Human Relations Award from the National Conference of Christians and Jews. Senator Howard Baker was the keynote speaker.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Wright, Jerome
